text:
Mail task works on 1.5Beta1 but not on 1.5Beta2. I've installed Sun javamail 
1.2 and jaf 1.0.1
Here is the mail.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project id="mail" default="all" basedir=".">
<property environment="env"/>
<target name="all">
<mail from="jang@ford.com" tolist="jang@ford.com" subject="Build " 
message="ltest" mailhost="eccms1.dearborn.ford.com"/>
</target>
</project>

Here is the result when run with 1.5Beta2:
H:\19_49_149_38_cmmsscm_1023459040781_11>cmd /x /c ant -verbose -debug -
